The charm of this game wears off extremely quickly for a multiplayer horror game. Matches are less about your ability to sneak/run and more about you and the killers perks. As a rank 15 killer I had multiple matches with four rank 1 survivors and got demolished. They were using perks and abilities I never heard about and it was rather soul crushing. Then when I played as a rank 16 survivor, all my teammates were below my rank and the killer was rank 7. The killer knew my position at all times and quickly killed every survivor in less than 4 minutes. This is not a fun experience.

Until the game either makes a casual perk-less game mode or fixes its matchmaking, the games enjoyment goes down considerably past rank 20.

this game has very questionable, incredibly outdated matchmaking; although fair mention to the fact that it starts out quite nice actually, as anywhere from ranks 11-20 you should expect usually to be put against other players vaguely around your perceived skill via the ranking system. at this point i can genuinely recommend the game, bugs and balancing-aside.

the reason i'm giving this a negative review is that everything from rank 1-10 is hilariously awful, because this rank is usually host to players from anywhere with 30 hours up to 3,500 hours and onwards. i recently reached red ranks and i am frequently being matchmade with people who have literally got over 10x my hours in the game and am expected by the ranking system to perform up-to-par with these people, people who are far more invested and thus have several advantage over players with significantly less hours. this has led to a generally held sentiment that ranks are frankly meaningless, but i think the issue is much larger than simply the ranking system. the game is very casual yet at the highest ranks people treat this game like an end-game mmorpg with relentless min-maxing in perks, equipment, etc. people who play should not expect to have awfully fair nor fun matches once the honeymoon of early ranks end and should buckle down to experience a great deal of frustration and disappointment at both the game and the playerbase surrounding it, as the community does this game no justice both in-game and the mouthbreathers who don't actually play the game but still sit on r/deadbydaylight thinking they know better. 

i will probably keep playing this game, but this is a warning to those newer players looking into this game with starry eyes; you won't have all that much fun after you've gotten invested. the game has become too competitive for its own good and you're at a grand disadvantage if you haven't joined people who run the "meta" perks.

I've played some games similar to this but Dead by Daylight still feels like the one above all. The game makes both sides very satisfying to play. Take for instance the Killer, you have to hunt down all the survivors but it can take some cunning actions and planning to really take them all out. As survivors, it really does feel horrifying to try and do objectives while being chased by these monstrosities. Equippable perks keep the game fresh, though I imagine there are some obvious broken builds. There's a lot of content for this game I'd without a doubt recommend to anyone curious.

The only saving grace of this game is the licensed characters. Apart from that, hitboxes or latency as some put it, is still an issue despite dedicated servers. On top of that, you get people with over 1000h with little to no game sense or just them being scummy that made it unfun. Oh did I mention matchmaking is all over the place. The game can be enjoyable but for how grindy it is to get the perks, it's not a game you want to be invested in in its current state.

Das Problem ist die Community, damit mein ich jetzt nicht das jeder ein Arsch ist, aber wenn Killer von Anfang an gemobbt werden fangen sie an Hässlich zu spielen, was ich auch verstehe, aber wenn ich dann als surv nur gecampt werde oder Getunnelt werde, zerstört das den Spaß sehr krass, dazu sind viele Killer zu Stark und wenn man das den noch mit den vorher genannten Themen vereinigt ist das spiel nur noch traurig und was was man nicht lange spielen kann.Vom Preis geht DBD und die Dlcs ganz klar, ich kann aber nur empfehlen die über MMOGA zukaufen, weil die da Meiste zeit Günstiger sind.Mit Freunden kann es Spaßig sein, aber wenn man Solo mit Randoms spielt, könnte man kotzen ich bin meiste zeit Rank 2–3 und bekomme mates die Rank 15 oder höher sind das die noch nicht viel Erfahrung haben und ein meistens sofort wegsterben oder einen Firsthook sterben lassen ist nicht toll aber dass es das nicht geben sollte ist wohl jedem klar, den das Problem gibt es schon Ewig und es haben auch andere natürlich kann man auch Spaß haben in diesen spiel das gibt es am Anfang noch sehr oft, wenn man noch nicht so Hohen Rank ist, aber später kann man nicht mal so ein Ründschen spielen weil man dann länger Spielen muss um auch wieder reinzukommen (Spaß) zuhaben. Es gibt viele Leute die absichtlich ekelhaft Killer spielen um ihren Hass auszulassen was natürlich nicht schön ist aber das Sammeln von Hass Kommentaren und sich es als lebensaufgaben zu machen dich zu Toxischen ist schon wieder Traurig, den das ist schon fasst ein Status für DBD geworden ist.

Save your $$$ not worth it in the long run. The Community is the worst ive ever been apart of and im 29years old been around gaming since GameBattles on Socom 2. Especially to new players, Ive Played this game alot to give it a fair shake, but i realize now how much of a waste of time and $$ it was in my little free time, In order to be any viable in this game you need certain perks for Survivor or Killer that are behind DLC paid walls to unlock, the grind is tedious and long. Ive played Both killer and Survivor alot so trust me its not worth it. Fun for a bit bc the idea is cool and the Horror Movie icons in the game. But gets very repetitive fast. On top of it weather your playing Killer and going against a Survivor Team of friends all with flash lights and 4 OP perks where they get like 4 extra lives almost and bully the killer completely then proceed to Tbag you in game and after match in chat Talk so much shit to you and being racist as hell sometimes and Trying to Report them is a joke. Then if you play Survivor youll get Killers that love to Face Camp you on hook or only go after one survivor the whole entire match. so either way you play its unfun, stressful, and could lose your sanity bc of how bad the toxic level is in this community that i rlly can not recommend it. The Devs dont care at all they just keep releasing new DLC's to make $$ every few months and barely fix any bugs or the Matchmaking in the game bc thats horrendous and wont get into it. 

-Sorry for a long review but i hope this at least helps 1 person trying to make a decision on weather to spend there money on this game or a different one. P.S. GO WITH A DIFFERENT GAME TRUST ME
